sellerCard.oneLiner: Expert Vetted AI Develope AI Chatbots ChatGPT Mobile App Developer
sellerCard.description: Hello! I'm Shovon, a dedicated and expert-vetted AI developer with over 5 years of experience in the field. My expertise spans across artificial intelligence, natural language processing, and mobile app development. I pride myself on delivering high-quality, efficient, and user-friendly AI solutions that drive business growth and enhance user experience.

description.content:
Are you looking for a professional AI software developer to enhance your AI app with cutting-edge GPT technology? no need to look further!


I'm Shovon, an Independent senior AI developer, I am an experienced AI application specializing in OpenAI's GPT-4 to build innovative and powerful websites, custom AI, machine learning, data science, and statistical solutions.


Chatbots I do:


  • Hybrid Chatbots
  • AI-Powered Chatbots
  • Rule-Based Chatbots
  • Keyword-Based Chatbots
  • Contextual Chatbots
  • Voice-Activated Chatbots
  • Social Messaging Chatbots
  • Transactional Chatbots
  • Support/Service Chatbots


Technologies I use to develop AI software:


  • Node.JS
  • Express.JS
  • Python
  • Flutter 
  • React.Js
  • Next.Js
  • MongoDB
  • MySQL
  • MERN


AI Applications that build:


  • Train Custom LLM
  • AI Chatbot
  • AI Integrations
  • AI Fine-Tuning
  • Custom GPT Apps
  • vapi ai or bland agent call bot
  • AI Applications in Healthcare AI app and AI website
  • Integrating Chatbots into Existing Systems
  • Cloud-based Chatbot Deployment (AWS & GCP)
  • AI Chatbot Development using OpenAI LLM and ChatGPT


Why Choose Me?


  • Extensive Experience
  • Provide source code 
  • Code with comment
  • 24/7 Availability


 Contact now and enhance your web app with state-of-the-art AI.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What services do you offer?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Custom AI app development, machine learning models, chatbot creation, and AI integration.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Which technologies do you specialize in?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Python, TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, OpenCV, and NLP frameworks.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you ensure data privacy and security?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I use data encryption, secure coding practices, and confidentiality agreements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your development process?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Requirement analysis, planning, data preprocessing, model development, testing, deployment, and support.

reviews.comment: Well, what can I say? I’ve had some very bad experiences on Fiver with unprofessional people stating they can do a professional job and they do not deliver what was promised, but this team went above and beyond my expectations I would highly recommend Shovon and his team they did a very professional job for my company which is going to generate us massive revenue

Well, what can I say? I’ve had some very bad experiences on Fiver with unprofessional people stating they can do a professional job and they do not deliver what was promised, but this team went above and beyond my expectations I would highly recommend Shovon and his team they did a very professional job for my company which is going to generate us massive revenue.

Shovon and his team were exceptional.  They took great care to produce a difficult website to my specifications.  We had many meetings throughout the development effort which solidified the direction of the site.  I feel confident they will support the site further as we move into production.

This was for the first phase (out of 2) of my project and I have to say I am very well pleased with Shovon and his team members. They have been patient with me and my hurriedness and have shown professionalism and expertise every step of the way. I look forward to the full completion of the project and working with them again in the near future.

The design for this site is all inclusive of setting up security, payment plans, and functioning AI chat code that I really wanted.  Shovon's team has been working hard to deliver high quality code, and I really appreciate it.  Looking forward to the end product.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback.

reviews_snippet.comment: It’s been an absolute pleasure working with Shovon. His expertise shone through every phase of the project, and his commitment to delivering excellent results was evident at every turn. His attention to detail and ability to execute the work with precision made all the difference, and I’m deeply thankful for his contribution.
It’s fantastic to hear that Shovon brings both experience and enthusiasm to his work! Those qualities make for a truly exceptional collaborator.
Shovon is an exceptional AI developer! His work is professional, and he always delivers on time. Plus, his polite demeanor and proactive communication make collaborating a breeze. Highly recommend! 👏

Shovon is an outstanding professional—efficient, skilled, and highly reliable. He consistently delivered top-notch work ahead of schedule. I wouldn’t hesitate to hire him again and strongly recommend his services!

Shovon has been fantastic to work with. I've collaborated with him several times, and each experience has been exceptional. He’s incredibly skilled in both Bubble and Voice Flow, making him a go-to for any project involving those platforms. I would gladly work with him again. Thanks for your great work, Shovon!

consultationData.description: I will offer specialized guidance on your project, walk you through the steps, and address your questions. For the best results, come prepared with specific topics or challenges to discuss
